channel.title: Towncraft Podcast
channel.description: Culled from over 2500 photos and 200 hours of interviews and archival footage from the past 20 years, TOWNCRAFT is a 100-minute feature documentary film that looks at the importance of local scenes in a changing music world. Unlike other towns, an underground-Rock scene emerged in Little Rock in the late 80s composed almost entirely of kids. 14-18 year-olds were booking their own shows, starting record labels, opening record stores, and playing with large national acts. TOWNCRAFT focuses on the roots of the Little Rock scene, how it changed the lives of those involved, the enormous DIY ethos that has shaped the scene for the past 20 years, and how the scene continues to thrive as its pioneers hit their mid-30s.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Notes From a Local Scene
channel.itunes:summary: Culled from over 2500 photos and 200 hours of interviews and archival footage from the past 20 years, TOWNCRAFT is a 100-minute feature documentary film that looks at the importance of local scenes in a changing music world. Unlike other towns, an underground-Rock scene emerged in Little Rock in the late 80s composed almost entirely of kids. 14-18 year-olds were booking their own shows, starting record labels, opening record stores, and playing with large national acts. TOWNCRAFT focuses on the roots of the Little Rock scene, how it changed the lives of those involved, the enormous DIY ethos that has shaped the scene for the past 20 years, and how the scene continues to thrive as its pioneers hit their mid-30s.
channel.itunes:author: Matson Films

item.title: Episode 11: The Origami Critters
item.description: The Origami Critters ask you to be kind to the venue.
item.author: albert@matsonfilms.com
item.itunes:subtitle: The Origami Critters ask you to be kind to the venue.
item.itunes:summary: The Origami Critters ask you to be kind to the venue.

item.title: Episode 10: Smoke Up Johnny
item.description: Smoke Up Johnny tells us there's more to Little Rock than the Clintons and Christian rock. Smoke Up Johnny is Alan Diaster, AC Danger, and Matt Floyd.
item.author: albert@matsonfilms.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Smoke Up Johnny tells us there's more to Little Rock than the Clintons and Christian rock. Smoke Up Johnny is Alan Diaster, AC Danger, and Matt Floyd.
item.itunes:summary: Smoke Up Johnny tells us there's more to Little Rock than the Clintons and Christian rock. Smoke Up Johnny is Alan Diaster, AC Danger, and Matt Floyd.
item.itunes:author: Matson Films

item.title: Episode 9: Ben Nichols
item.description: Lucero's album "Nobody's Darling" was nominated for the 2006 Plug Independent Music Awards for Best Americana Album. Little Rock native frontman Ben Nichols talks about being part of an up-and-coming band.
item.author: albert@matsonfilms.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Lucero's album "Nobody's Darling" was nominated for the 2006 Plug Independent Music Awards for Best Americana Album. Little Rock native frontman Ben Nichols talks about being part of an up-and-coming band.

item.title: Episode 8: Kevin Kerby
item.description: Most Little Rock musicians will tell you this guy is not only their favorite singer and songwriter in town, but that his music embodies the essence of Little Rock. And, he's funny.
item.author: albert@matsonfilms.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Most Little Rock musicians will tell you this guy is not only their favorite singer and songwriter in town, but that his music embodies the essence of Little Rock. And, he's funny.

item.itunes:author: Matson Films

item.title: Episode 7: Five-O
item.description: This is what happens when Little Rockers tour and stalk John Mellencamp. Five-O is Burt Taggart, Shannon Yarbrough, Graham Cobb, and Andy Conrad. Joining them on this 1993 tour is John Pugh.
item.author: albert@matsonfilms.com
item.itunes:subtitle: This is what happens when Little Rockers tour and stalk John Mellencamp. Five-O is Burt Taggart, Shannon Yarbrough, Graham Cobb, and Andy Conrad. Joining them on this 1993 tour is John Pugh.

item.title: Episode 6: Ben Dickey
item.description: Ben Dickey of Blood Feathers and Amen Booze Rooster is a really good singer songwriter. That's all you need to know.
item.author: albert@matsonfilms.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Ben Dickey of Blood Feathers and Amen Booze Rooster is a really good singer songwriter. That's all you need to know.

item.title: Episode 5: Chris Denny & The Old Soles
item.description: Chris Denny is the boy with the godlen voice. Watch this Little Rock musician call upon sounds of old to create a youthfully unique sound.
item.author: albert@matsonfilms.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Chris Denny is the boy with the godlen voice. Watch this Little Rock musician call upon sounds of old to create a youthfully unique sound.

item.title: Episode 4: Chino Horde performs at Vino's
item.description: At 15 years old, the members of Chino Horde had the stage presence of experienced musicians. Chino Horde is David Burns, Burt Taggart, Steve Schmidt, and Jason White.
item.author: albert@matsonfilms.com
item.itunes:subtitle: At 15 years old, the members of Chino Horde had the stage presence of experienced musicians. Chino Horde is David Burns, Burt Taggart, Steve Schmidt, and Jason White.

item.title: Episode 3: Bloodless Cooties perform at State Street
item.description: State Street was a venue that hosted most Little Rock bands in the mid 90s. Watch Bloodless Cooties perform there. The Bloodless Cooties are Jeremy Colburn, Jerry Colburn and Louisa Rook.
item.author: albert@matsonfilms.com
item.itunes:subtitle: State Street was a venue that hosted most Little Rock bands in the mid 90s. Watch Bloodless Cooties perform there. The Bloodless Cooties are Jeremy Colburn, Jerry Colburn and Louisa Rook.

item.title: Episode 2: American Princes
item.description: No one ever said going on tour was a walk in the park. Listen to how the American Princes went from royalty to rags on their first national tour. American Princes are David Slade, Collins Kilgore, Matt Quinn and Luke Hunsicker.
item.author: albert@matsonfilms.com
